topic.title: Setting Up a Floating License Server for

section.title: Determine if your need to set up a license server
section.p:
If you are using floating licenses for , you may need to set up a license server.
If the computers that will be using the floating licenses are all on the same network segment, can manage the licenses by itself. Different running instances of communicate among themselves, using UDP broadcast on the 59153 port, to the 239.255.255.255 group. Different running instances of communicate among themselves, using UDP broadcast on the 59153 port, to the 239.255.255.255 group.
If the computers that will be using the floating licenses are on different network segments, you must use an floating license server. A floating license server can be installed either as a Java servlet or as a standalone process.

section.title: Split or combine license keys to work with your license servers
section.p: A license server can only manage one license key (which can cover any number of floating licenses. If you have multiple license keys for the same version and you want to have all of them managed by the same server, or if you have a multiple-user floating license and you want to split it between two or more license servers, please contact support@oxygenxml.com and ask for a new license key.
